explanation: [0-0] The screen is split. Both the upper and lower parts share the same scene: A tall man wearing a blue athletic top and black shorts and a smaller version of him wearing a white T-shirt with pink patterns and black shorts are standing on a cliff overlooking the sea. The tall man is in front, and the smaller version is behind. The cliff is composed of brown rocks and green grass. The brown rock on the cliff in the upper part has the word "DAD," while the brown rock in the lower part has the word "MOM."

[0-6] Then they both start to walk forward, reaching the edge of the cliff. The tall man representing "DAD" in the upper part directly carries a piece of wood and places it on the edge, forming a bridge. However, the tall man representing "MOM" in the lower part guides the smaller version behind him to carry the wood and place it on the edge, also forming a bridge. Eventually, both men successfully cross to the other side. After reaching the opposite bank, a fire burns on the grass in front of them.
